text: Hockey is a sport for white men. Basketball is a sport for black men. Golf is a sport for white men dressed like black pimps.
author: Tiger Woods

text: I'm trying as hard as I can, and sometimes things don't go your way, and that's the way things go.
author: Tiger Woods

text: No matter how good you get you can always get better, and that's the exciting part.
author: Tiger Woods

text: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.
author: Tiger Woods

text: I just try to be the best I can be and hope that is the best ever.
author: Tiger Woods

text: If you're lucky to have three close people in your life, you're blessed.
author: Tiger Woods

text: I want to say to each of you, simply, and directly, I am deeply sorry for my irresponsible and selfish behavior I engaged in.
author: Tiger Woods

text: My main focus is on my game.
author: Tiger Woods

text: My mind is my biggest asset. I expect to win every tournament I play.
author: Tiger Woods

text: The greatest thing about tomorrow is, I will be better than I am today.
author: Tiger Woods

text: If you're not nervous, it means you don't care.
author: Tiger Woods

text: Achievements on the golf course are not what matters, decency and honesty are what matter.
author: Tiger Woods

text: The virtue of privacy is one that must be protected in matters that are intimate and within one's own family.
author: Tiger Woods

text: Well, you know, a lot of people look at the negative things, the things that they did wrong and- which I do. But I like to stress on the things I did right, because there are certain things that I like to look at from a positive standpoint that are just positive reinforcement.
author: Tiger Woods

text: No matter how good you get you can always get better and that's the exciting part.
author: Tiger Woods

text: I get to play golf for a living. What more can you ask for, getting paid for doing what you love.
author: Tiger Woods
